data.name: Legend of Keepers: Career of a Dungeon Master
data.detailed_description:
Subscribe to newsletter!

We will send one email every month to give some news about the game. Feel free to subscribe at this form


Join us on Discord


Goblinz Studio has its official Discord server , where we share our work in progress on the project.


About the Game



In this original mix of a Dungeon Defender and a Roguelite designed by Goblinz Studio (authors of Dungeon Rushers), you will manage your career as a Dungeon Master!

Features


  • Join the Dungeons Company and try to climb the ladder
  • Try to stop heroes and protect the treasures of the company
  • Hire monsters, manage your employees and your stock of traps
  • Deal with employees strikes and other fun events

RogueDefender


Each run will be different but players will keep some bonuses for their master between runs. Our game is a mix between a Roguelite and a Dungeon Defender. How did we achieve that? We've run many tests to find the perfect mix between a management and a dungeon phase!

Dungeon Phase


First, you will have to plan your defense against a group of adventurers. Check their stats and resistances, then place the best traps and monsters to defeat them! When you think your dungeon is ready, let the crawl begin!

You will then be able to watch those heroes die! It's a reversed dungeon crawler, heroes will move through your dungeon and will trigger the traps you've placed. When a group of adventurers meets a group of monsters you've positioned in your dungeon, a turn-based fight will happen!

Masters Classes


Put yourself in the shoes of a Dungeon Master! You will be able to choose between our 3 original classes!





Games/Series that inspired us:

HeroQuest (Board Game), Naheulbeuk (French audio serie), Kaamelott (best french serie), Monthy python (english serie)

Videos games: Darkest Dungeon, Slay the Spire, Dungeon Keeper, Final Fantasy, Divinity, For the King, Chroma Squad, Battle Brothers, West of loathing and so much more

data.short_description: Legend of Keepers is the perfect mix between a Dungeon Defender and a Roguelike. You have been hired as a dungeon master by the Company of Dungeon. Your job is simple: Protect their dungeons!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Czech, Ukrainian, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.1
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ Desktop only
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

data.legal_notice: Game developed and published by Goblinz Studio SAS (France).
